name: Coffee In Metropolis
description:
This is a virtual reality game I made with Unity 

Description: 

Coffee in Metropolis is a Virtual Reality casual game. The player is a coffee shop’s owner who tries to run her own business and bring her coffee shop to popularity in the metropolis. You can interact with different kinds of machines and tools to make all kinds of coffee. Accomplish the orders in time will make great rewards during the game, while the customer may get extremely angry if you take too much time and leave right away. Help the coffee shop owner to satisfy all the customer’s needs as possible and achieve a happy ending.
